page.title: 11Tree planting at Ipplepen.
page.content: In July{we planted five trees}in our {school grounds}to{commemorate}this {modern Domesday Book. The trees were grown from seeds which we collected last Autumn when we visited the Roselands building site in our village. The trees are{Oak, Horsechestnut}and {Ash.}They are all planted to the East of our school. Each of the trees is about half a metre in height. We have also planted an oak and a sycamore at the bottom eastern corner of our playing field. Each of the twenty-eight children in class has taken{a seed}from a{maritime {pine}to plant in their garden. The seed cone came from the gardens at Dartington Hall.
